T02D3077:172b-0: @172b sangs rgyas kyi sku dang mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba bshad pa /
T02D3077:172b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma
T02D3077:172b-2: snyed thams cad kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis te
T02D3077:172b-5: de la tshe blangs pa'i sku ni yab yum las skyes pa'i mig dang yid tshim par byed pa /
T02D3077:172b-6: dag par byed pa skrun par byed pa sta /
T02D3077:172b-7: sku tshigs re re zhing sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan la /
T02D3077:172b-8: tshigs re re yang bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D3077:172b-9: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
T02D3077:172b-10: brgyan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par
T02D3077:172b-11: byas pa mthong na ba lta bas chog mi shes
T02D3077:172b-12: shing mi mthun pa med pa dang /
T02D3077:172b-13: blta bar bya ba bla na med pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshe blangs pa'i sku'o //
T02D3077:172b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni /
T02D3077:172b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud par zad kyi /
T02D3077:172b-16: rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu dag dang /
T02D3077:172b-17: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams nam chad ni /
T02D3077:172b-18: su yang rgya chen yang dag par rab tu ston par ji ltar byas kyang nus pa med de /
T02D3077:172b-20: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02D3077:172b-21: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
T02D3077:172b-24: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
T02D3077:172b-25: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
T02D3077:172b-26: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po'i chos 'di dag dang /
T02D3077:172b-28: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /
T02D3077:173a-3: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T02D3077:173a-7: bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /
T02D3077:173a-9: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum dang ;
T02D3077:173a-10: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
T02D3077:173a-11: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T02D3077:173a-12: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /
T02D3077:173a-13: mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
T02D3077:173a-14: zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /
T02D3077:173a-15: mi slob pa'i chos bcu dang /
T02D3077:173a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
T02D3077:173a-17: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-18: las bdag gis bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-23: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-24: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-25: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-26: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-27: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-28: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3077:173a-29: zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3077:173a-30: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
T02D3077:173a-31: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
T02D3077:173a-32: rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug dang /
T02D3077:173a-33: ma 'dres par bsgom pa rnams dang /
T02D3077:173a-35: nyon mongs pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
T02D3077:173a-37: shes rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang /
T02D3077:173a-45: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /
T02D3077:173a-49: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang /
T02D3077:173a-53: dbang po nyi shu gnyis rnams yin no //
T02D3077:173a-54: zab cing mchog tu zab pa'i chos 'di dag ni
T02D3077:173b-0: yang dag par rdzogs @173b pa'i sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung
T02D3077:173b-1: gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa ste /
T02D3077:173b-2: gang rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D3077:173b-3: spyi'i mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs nas nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs su chud de /
T02D3077:173b-8: mu stegs can sna tshogs dge sbyong dang /
T02D3077:173b-19: lto 'phye chen po rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te /
T02D3077:173b-20: sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams btul nas 'khor grangs med pa khrag khrig brgya stong dang /
T02D3077:173b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du zhugs so //
